issue.title: [FlightRPC][C++][Java] Add column metadata for type name on FlightSQL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16064](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16064). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This adds a new column metadata field ARROW:FLIGHT:SQL:TYPE_NAME to FlightSQL resultset schemas.

This improvement allows datasources to specify custom data type names on JDBC driver.
